items.title: Silicon Valley spooks the AI safety advocates
items.description: The White House's David Sacks and OpenAI's Jason Kwon caused a stir online this week for their comments about groups promoting AI safety.

items.title: Your AI tools run on fracked gas and bulldozed Texas land
items.description: If you're wondering why AI companies are pursuing this path, they'll tell you it's not just about electricity — it's about beating China.
